title: malayamArutam varum
sahitya:
malayamArutam varum vELaiyE en mannan varuvadAgap shonna vELaiyE


anupallavi

  kalaik-karppanaiyaik-kaDanda shuddhavanak-kani malar maNam kalandu vIsuginra


caraNam    mAnAbhimAna mAnadondaminri maruLinri mana orumaiyil Urum
tEn aruviyin gAna vEda nAdan sErap-pErinbattai vAri vAri vIsum
